name: .SCZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .SCZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File saved by SmartDraw, a professional diagramming program; contains a collection of SmartDraw files; used for saving groups of files together, such as .SDR files and images; also used for maintaining reference links to local files and hyperlinks to remote files.

content: Collection packages are archives of Collections, which are directories that contain SmartDraw file assets. To first create a Collection, select the Save As... → SmartDraw Document (SDR) option from the SmartDraw application menu, and then choose "-Create New Collection..." from the "Save In Collection" drop down menu. The directory that is created now contains collection files for this drawing.

Once operating within a Collection, you can export a Collection Package by selecting the SmartDraw menu and choosing Collection → Export Collection. Similarly, to import a Collection Package, select Collection → Import Collection from the SmartDraw application menu.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
